    • Method Detail

      • createCorpus

        private java.util.ArrayList<Tweet> createCorpus(java.io.File data)
                                         throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a Tweet class for each Tweet in the data file and adds them to the test-/training set.
        Parameters:
        data - The data used to create the corpus.
        Returns:
        Returns the corpus.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Throws IO exception if the data file can not be read.

      • createTokenList

        private java.util.ArrayList<Token> createTokenList(java.lang.String tweetText)
        Creates a Token class for each token in the text.
        Parameters:
        tweetText - Contains the text of the Tweet.
        Returns:
        Returns an ArrayList containing all Token classes of the Tweet.
